concept\/index.md.Voici les principaux concepts de base de: Here are the main basic concepts of Jeedom
concept\/index.md.Cette documentation reste volontairement: This documentation is deliberately kept simple in order to help you take control of your home automation
concept\/index.md.Les possibilités de Jeedom sont quasi in: The possibilities of Jeedom are almost endless, since you can with a few php, python or other scripts create a lot of things, but that's not the subject here
concept\/index.md.Les liens ci-dessous pointent vers le Co: The links below point to the Core v4.1
concept\/index.md.Une fois sur la page de documentation (M: Once on the documentation page (User or configuration manual) you can change version in the menu at the top left to switch to the version corresponding to the Core you want
concept\/index.md.Jeedom permet d'interfacer de très nombr: Jeedom makes it possible to interface a large number of devices together, whether these are based on the Z-Wave, Enocean, Zigbee etc. protocols, on APIs thanks to plugins, or directly in the form of scripts
concept\/index.md.pour avoir un aperçu des périphériques s: for an overview of supported devices
concept\/index.md.Vous pouvez afficher ces périphériques d: You can display these devices in several ways
concept\/index.md.Ceux-ci sont consultables dans un naviga: These are viewable in a browser on a desktop computer, or on a smartphone with the WebApp or mobile application
concept\/index.md.Afin d'organiser vos périphériques, vous: In order to organize your devices, you can create
concept\/index.md.Ces objets peuvent représenter des pièce: These objects can represent rooms in the house (Living room, Bedroom, Workshop
concept\/index.md.Chaque objet peut avoir un objet parent: Each object can have a parent object
concept\/index.md.Cette hiérarchie servira à l'affichage s: This hierarchy will be used for display on the Dashboard
concept\/index.md.Par exemple, vous pouvez avoir un objet: For example, you can have an object
concept\/index.md.Une fois sur le Dashboard, l'objet: Once on the Dashboard, the object
concept\/index.md.affichera aussi, en dessous, ses objets: will also display, below, its child objects
concept\/index.md.vous pouvez définir sur quel objet vous: you can define on which object you want to arrive on the Dashboard
concept\/index.md.Pour interagir avec notre domotique, il: To interact with our home automation, you need commands
concept\/index.md.Rassurez-vous, les commandes sont normal: Rest assured, orders are normally created automatically
concept\/index.md.Ces explications sont pour une meilleure: These explanations are for a better understanding
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes stockent des informations,: These commands store information from sensors
concept\/index.md.Par exemple, la température d'une sonde,: For example, the temperature of a probe, a movement of a presence sensor, etc
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes peuvent être historisées a: These commands can be logged in order to keep this information over time in the form of a curve
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes peuvent aussi servir à déc: These commands can also be used to trigger
concept\/index.md.afin d'automatiser des actions en foncti: in order to automate actions based on information reported by your sensors
concept\/index.md.Par exemple, un capteur de mouvement dét: For example, a motion sensor detects a presence, which will trigger a scenario that will turn on the light
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes permettent de piloter vos: These commands allow you to control your actuators
concept\/index.md.d'une prise commandée vous permettront d: a controlled outlet will allow you to turn it on and off
concept\/index.md.Les commandes action sont généralement l: Action commands are usually linked to info commands
concept\/index.md.Ici, notre prise possède deux actions: Here, our grip has two actions
concept\/index.md.Ces deux types de commandes sont rattach: These two types of commands are attached in the form of equipment
concept\/index.md.L'équipement possède donc des commandes: The equipment therefore has info and/or action commands, and it is this equipment which will have an Object as its parent, allowing you to display it wherever you wish
concept\/index.md.Chaque commande peux également posséder: Each command can also have what is called a generic type, allowing Jeedom and certain plugins to know the type of command (State of a socket, button of a light, etc
concept\/index.md.J'ai une prise avec un bouton on\/off et: I have a socket with an on/off button and a status led, in the living room
concept\/index.md.J'ai un équipement avec deux actions on: I have equipment with two on and off actions and a status info, in the Salon object
concept\/index.md.Ces équipements sont créés par des plugi: These equipments are created by plugins
concept\/index.md.Par exemple, le plugin Z-Wave vous perme: For example, the Z-Wave plugin will allow you to include your Z-Waze plug, which will create a piece of equipment with its controls, which you can name and link to an Object
concept\/index.md.En terme d'affichage, chaque commande es: In terms of display, each order is displayed using a Widget
concept\/index.md.Le Core propose les principaux Widgets,: The Core offers the main Widgets, as well as a tool to create them (V4
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes sont regroupées dans une t: These commands are grouped in a tile corresponding to your equipment
concept\/index.md.Et cette tuile sera donc affichée sur le: And this tile will therefore be displayed on the Dashboard in the Object you have chosen
concept\/index.md.Quel que soit votre périphérique, il ser: Whatever your peripheral, it will therefore be created in the form of a piece of equipment, from a
concept\/index.md.Ce périphérique comportera ses propres c: This device will have its own commands
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes seront affichées sous form: These commands will be displayed as Widgets forming the equipment tile, in its parent object
concept\/index.md.Vous verrez ensuite que chaque Objet, Éq: You will then see that each Object, Equipment, Command has many options, in terms of functionality or display
concept\/index.md.Mais chaque chose en son temps, maintena: But everything in its time, now you should have understood the basic concepts of Jeedom, and thus be able to start organizing your home automation by knowing where to look
concept\/index.md.L'intérêt de la domotique, au delà du co: The interest of home automation, beyond the centralized and remote control of our peripherals, lies above all in automation
concept\/index.md.Le but n'est pas de passer des heures de: The goal is not to spend hours in front of your Dashboard or its Design, but on the contrary that your home adapts to your habits and is forgotten
concept\/index.md.Plus de volets à ouvrir et fermer tous l: No more shutters to open and close every day, no more lights to turn on and off, being warned when to put the trash on the street, when there is mail in the mailbox, heating that adapts according to seasons and climatic conditions
concept\/index.md.Les possibilités sont infinies, et dépen: The possibilities are endless, and depend on everyone's lifestyle
concept\/index.md.Les scénarios sont là pour çà: The scenarios are there for that
concept\/index.md.Un scénario est une suite d'actions défi: A scenario is a sequence of defined actions that will run at certain times of the day
concept\/index.md.L'exécution peut-être programmée (tous l: The execution can be scheduled (every Monday at such time), or caused by an event
concept\/index.md.Comme vue plus haut, cet événement peut: As seen above, this event can for example be our info command
concept\/index.md.d'un détecteur de mouvement, suite à une: of a motion detector, following a detection
concept\/index.md.Le but ici n'est pas d'être exhaustif ma: The goal here is not to be exhaustive but to discover the scenarios through simple examples. The
concept\/index.md.Allumage de la lumière sur détection de: Switching on the light on motion detection
concept\/index.md.Admettons que nous ayons une lumière pil: Let's say we have a controlled light and a motion detector in the room
concept\/index.md.A droite, dans la partie: On the right, in the part
concept\/index.md.vérifiez que le mode est bien en: check that the mode is in
concept\/index.md.à droite du champ: to the right of the field
concept\/index.md.sélectionnez l'objet puis l'équipement e: select the object then the equipment and its command
concept\/index.md.est ce qui va déclencher l'exécution de: is what will trigger the execution of this scenario
concept\/index.md.Ici, nous souhaitons le déclencher quand: Here, we want to trigger it when our detector detects a presence, so we will use the command `
concept\/index.md.Les `#` indiquent une commande, ensuite: The `#` indicate a command, then we find `[the name of its parent object]`, then `[the name of the equipment]`, and finally `[the name of the command]`
concept\/index.md.Ici, on ajoute ` == 1` car on veux que l: Here, we add ` == 1` because we want the scenario to trigger only on the detection of a presence
concept\/index.md.Or sur un détecteur de présence, cette d: However, on a presence detector, this detection returns to 0 a few seconds after
concept\/index.md.Ce passage à 0 ne déclenchera donc pas u: This change to 0 will therefore not trigger our scenario again
concept\/index.md.puis sur le bouton en haut: then the button at the top
concept\/index.md.Cette action sera notre commande d'allum: This action will be our light on command
concept\/index.md.Sauvegardez, et votre scénario est prêt: Save, and your scenario is ready
concept\/index.md.Nous avons fait ici qu'effleurer les pos: We have only scratched the surface here of the possibilities of the scenarios
concept\/index.md.et même utiliser directement du code php: and even use php code directly (block
concept\/index.md.Nous avons ici utilisé le mode de déclen: Here we have used the trigger mode
concept\/index.md.Mais vous pouvez également utiliser (et: But you can also use (and combine) the mode
concept\/index.md.pour exécuter un scénario tous les matin: to run a scenario every morning, or every hour, etc
concept\/index.md.Un sujet récurrent pour les débutants su: A recurring subject for beginners on Jeedom, the programming of daily events like
concept\/index.md.Allumer la cafetière à 7h en semaine: Turn on the coffee maker at 7 a.m. on weekdays
concept\/index.md.Fermer les volets au coucher du soleil,: Close the shutters at sunset, if I'm not there
concept\/index.md.Pour ce type de scénario, voici une très: For this type of scenario, here is a very good introduction

concept\/summary.md.Jeedom propose un moyen très simple et c: Jeedom offers a very simple and clear way to display the situation of different components of your home, in order to immediately see how many lights are on, shutters open, alarm status, temperature, etc
concept\/summary.md.Les résumés sont affichés sous forme de: The summaries are displayed in the form of small icons in the Jeedom bar at the top, and on each object (Dashboard and Synthesis
concept\/summary.md.Au clic, ils permettent de voir directem: On click, they allow you to directly see the equipment included in the summary on which you clicked to act on it if necessary
concept\/summary.md.Il faut distinguer deux types de résumés: A distinction must be made between two types of summaries
concept\/summary.md.C'est l'ensemble des icônes de résumé af: This is the set of summary icons displayed in the bar of Jeedom
concept\/summary.md.Chaque objet possède son propre résumé,: Each object has its own summary, displayed on the summary in the object, and on the Dashboard to the right of the object name
concept\/summary.md.Le résumé global ne se paramètre pas dir: The global summary is not directly parameterized
concept\/summary.md.C'est un concentré des résumés des autre: It is a concentrate of the summaries of the other objects
concept\/summary.md.Par exemple, si une lumière est allumée: For example, if one light is on in the kitchen and two in the living room, the overall summary will show three lights on
concept\/summary.md.Bien sûr, tout ceci est paramétrable, co: Of course, all this can be configured, as we will see below
concept\/summary.md.Les résumés se configurent donc sur chaq: The summaries are therefore configured on each object, in the tab ... Summary
concept\/summary.md.Cette documentation a été écrite et illu: This documentation was written and illustrated on a Core v4.2
concept\/summary.md.Certaines options peuvent donc varier su: Some options may therefore vary depending on your version
concept\/summary.md.Avant de voir la configuration sur un ob: Before seeing the configuration on an object, to be able to configure a summary it must exist
concept\/summary.md.Vous avez ici la liste de tous les résum: Here you have the list of all the summaries that you will be able to configure on each object
concept\/summary.md.Nous pourrons ici paramétrer les résumés: Here we can configure the summaries
concept\/summary.md.si vous regardez bien, vous voyez dans l: if you look closely, you see in the global summary that there is a person at home
concept\/summary.md.etc. Et bien sûr, vous pouvez supprimer: etc And of course you can remove and add summary types here, so you have them available later on objects
concept\/summary.md.Rassurez vous, plusieurs choses sur cet: Rest assured, several things on this preview have been configured, but by default Jeedom has a list of summaries with standard parameters
concept\/summary.md.Parcourons ce qu'on va définir ici: Let's walk through what we're going to define here
concept\/summary.md.C'est une valeur qui doit être unique da: It is a value that must be unique in this list, which serves as a reference for the Core
concept\/summary.md.Le nom (type) du résumé, que vous retrou: The name (type) of the summary, which you will find in the object parameters
concept\/summary.md.Le type de calcul utilisé pour la valeur: The type of calculation used for the displayed value
concept\/summary.md.La somme pour des états, la moyenne pour: The sum for states, the average for e.g. temperatures, humidity, or the text value
concept\/summary.md.L'icône du résumé, affichée sur l'objet: The summary icon, displayed on the object and optionally in the global summary
concept\/summary.md.Icône du résumé si sa valeur vaut 0: Summary icon if its value is 0
concept\/summary.md.Permet de spécifier une icône différente: Allows you to specify a different icon such as shutter closed, light off, or different color, etc
concept\/summary.md.Unité du résumé, qui sera affiché à droi: Summary unit, which will be displayed to the right of the value
concept\/summary.md.N'affiche jamais la valeur du résumé (le: Never displays the summary value (the number to the right of the icon
concept\/summary.md.Permet de masquer la valeur du résumé, s: Allows you to hide the summary value, only if it is 0
concept\/summary.md.On peux ainsi souhaiter avoir l'icône vo: We can thus wish to have the open pane icon with their number, and the closed pane icon without the number when all the panes are closed
concept\/summary.md.Si vous comptez une donnée binaire alors: If you count binary data then you have to put this value to binary, example if you count the number of lamps lit but you just have the value of the dimmer (0 to 100), then you have to put binary, like that Jeedom will consider that if the value is greater than 1, then the lamp is on
concept\/summary.md.Afficher le résumé même quand sa valeur: Show summary even when its value is 0
concept\/summary.md.Ignorer une commande pour ce résumé si c: Ignore a command for this summary if it has not had an update for x minutes
concept\/summary.md.Lance la création d'un équipement virtue: Launches the creation of a virtual device with commands corresponding to the values in the summary
concept\/summary.md.Le dernier bouton, tout à droite, permet: The last button, on the far right, allows you to delete the summary
concept\/summary.md.Pour supprimer une icône il suffit de do: To remove an icon, just double click on it

concept\/summary.md.une relation ambiguë, pas toujours facil: an ambiguous relationship, not always easy to understand, but nevertheless very powerful, especially since Core v4
concept\/summary.md.Normalement, vous devriez maintenant avo: Normally, you should now have created some summaries on your objects, and therefore have several infos on your objects and in the global summary, such as your open shutters, your lights etc
concept\/summary.md.Ces résumés sont extrêmement pratique po: These summaries are extremely practical to have an overall and visual state of the accommodation very quickly, and on click to be able to act on it by displaying the equipment of a summary
concept\/summary.md.Mais si on poursuit le raisonnement, çà: But if we continue the reasoning, that means that this info exists... And that we could appreciate using it in a scenario

By triggering this action, we will turn off all the commands in the summary
